summary: Integration test suite for Conan's configuration subsystem, exercising authentication source plugins, configuration composition and inclusion, immutability, global settings, Jinja‑templated sections, version constraints, OS/architecture detection, copying of configuration objects, build‑require handling, command‑line overrides, host/build contexts, transitive tool dependencies, generator declarations, package identifier generation, and profile management for CMake/MSBuild with pattern matching and restrictions.
business_intent: Validate that Conan's configuration mechanisms operate reliably in real‑world usage, guaranteeing correct handling of credentials, file composition, immutability, templating, versioning, platform detection, copying, build requirements, overrides, tool dependencies, generators, package IDs, and profiles, thereby providing confidence to developers and users of the package manager.
